content: I really appreciated you keeping watch while I took a nap on the side of the road when we ran out of gas earlier.
Yes, a little bit. But honestly, I'm still pretty tired from all the driving today.
That's a good idea. I don't want to put either of us in a dangerous situation by driving when we're too tired.
Speaking of safety, do you remember that time when we got a flat tire on the way to your parents' house and had to pull over on that busy highway?
It was lucky that we had a spare tire and were able to change it quickly. But I remember feeling so anxious when we were stuck on the side of the road with cars whizzing past us.
You're definitely more prepared than I am. Thank goodness for your foresight.
Agreed. And let's also try to take more breaks and switch drivers on our future road trips. I don't want to put your safety, or mine, at risk.
Oh man, my stomach hasn't been feeling great today.
Yeah, I just need to take care of some business in here.
What? It's a natural bodily function.
Well, what should I say? "I'm going to poop"?
Ah, much better.
Nah, didn't need to. I'm just glad I feel better now.
Hey, remember when we ran out of gas on the highway and I took that nap?
I know, I'm sorry. But thanks for staying awake and watching out for both of us. You always take such good care of me.
That sounds great, thanks. By the way, remember that time I asked you to dance with me?
I can't believe I actually did it. I asked her out.
You know, that girl from work.
We haven't set a date yet, but I'm looking forward to it.
Not yet, I want to make sure the first date goes well before I plan anything too fancy.
Yeah, I was shaking when I asked her. But I'm glad I did it.
Thanks, it means a lot. Remember when we ran out of gas on the highway and I was too tired to keep going?
You always know how to take care of me. And remember after that, when I asked you to dance with me?
I want to keep having those moments with you. Even after all these years, I know I still love you more than anything.
I want to dance with you," she said.
I don't know, just been in the mood to dance lately.
That sounds perfect. It'll be nice to spend some quality time together.
Oh yeah, I remember. I was so tired from driving all day.
You were my hero that day. Thanks for looking after us.
I'm ready if you are.
I think we're lost.
I was supposed to turn right, but I think I turned left instead.
Of course, I can. But I left my phone at home.
Let's try asking for directions.
Yeah, I hope so. I don't want to be walking around all day.
Yeah, I do. That was not a fun experience.
That's true. I don't know what I would do without you.
Speaking of which, I remember a few weeks ago when I asked you to dance with me.
I just can't get enough of spending time with you, you know?
Of course, how could I forget? I was so nervous.
It sure did. And I'm grateful every day that we ended up together.
